amendment.description: To restrict the expenditure of funds for the salary of the Under Secretary for Farm and Foreign Agricultural Services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2111 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2111 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Miller. (consideration: CR S14009; text: CR S14009) To restrict the expenditure of funds for the salary of the Under Secretary for Farm and Foreign Agricultural Services.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2111 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Miller.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2111 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
